System Update

%1 Seconds
Scanning... Please wait.
Copying update data to the hard disk... Do not turn off the system.
Remove the storage media that contains update data. By removing the storage media, the system will automatically restart.
Update data of version %1 or later can be installed on this system.
This update data is not supported on this system.
★ Update via Hard Disk
★ Delete Update Data on Hard Disk
Select the update data.
Select the update data to delete.
Save Update Data on Hard Disk
The selected update data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Do you want to save the update data on the hard disk? The update data can be installed on the system software of version %1 or later.
%1 items of update data have already been saved. To save the update data newly, you must delete saved update data.
An error occurred during the download operation.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
A connection to the server could not be established.
Select an update method.

User Agreement

Accept
Do Not Accept
You must accept the user agreement to continue with the update.
Do you want to cancel the update operation?
Downloading update data... Do not turn off the system. After the download has completed, the system will automatically restart.
Copying update data to the hard disk... Do not turn off the system. After the copy operation has completed, the system will automatically restart.
Update data of the same version as the current system software was found. Do you want to install the same version?
Preparing to update... Do not turn off the system. After preparation has completed, the system will restart automatically.
Turn Off System Automatically After Update
Do not turn off the system during the update. If you do, you may not be able to restart the PS3™ system. Once the update is started you cannot go back to the previous version of the system software.
The latest version of the system software is already installed. There is no need to update.
No applicable update data was found.
An error occurred during connection to the server. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. At least %1 more free space is needed to update.
The server may currently be down for maintenance or updating. Try again later.
An error occurred during the download operation. This is a DNS error.
An error occurred during the download operation. A connection to the HTTP proxy server cannot be established.
An error occurred during the download operation. A connection to the server cannot be established.
Main Features Revised in System Software Version %1
For detailed information including limitations of usage, visit the SCE Web site for your region.
